summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Thursday 20 January to end of Friday 21 January GMT
description: Mainly dry forecast for Thursday with some sunshine feeling cold in brisk north westerly winds.  Similar for Friday with the cloud developing later in the day.<br/><br/>Back trajectories indicate the air arriving in the UK from the Atlantic, there should be good dispersion and negligible import.<br/><br/>Overall, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
